translations: 努比亚人的；努比亚语的

sentences.sentence: This bacterium can flourish on the dried grain used for making two staples of the Nubian diet, beer and bread.
sentences.translation: 这种细菌可以在干谷物上滋生，而干谷物用于制造努比亚人日常饮食的两大主食：啤酒和面包。

sentences.sentence: Hence their interest in Nubian art.
THE NUBIAN: The gods of my country are very fond of blood.
